Package org.odpi.openmetadata.commonservices.mermaid

package org.odpi.openmetadata.commonservices.mermaid
The Mermaid Services provide common routines for building Mermaid Markdown visualizations.
  • Class
    Description
    AssetGraphMermaidGraphBuilder
     
    AssetLineageEdgeGraphMermaidGraphBuilder
    Creates a mermaid graph rendering of the Open Metadata Framework's asset lineage edge graph.
    AssetLineageGraphMermaidGraphBuilder
    Creates a mermaid graph rendering of the Open Metadata Framework's asset lineage graph.
    Colour
    Colour helps to capture the colours we are using in the mermaid graphs.
    DataStructureMermaidGraphBuilder
    Creates a mermaid graph rendering of the Open Metadata Framework's data structure graph.
    GovernanceActionProcessMermaidGraphBuilder
     
    GovernanceDefinitionMermaidGraphBuilder
     
    HierarchyMermaidGraphBuilder
    Creates a mermaid graph rendering of a hierarchy.
    InformationSupplyChainMermaidGraphBuilder
    Creates a mermaid graph rendering of the Open Metadata Framework's information supply chain graph.
    MermaidGraphBuilderBase
    Provides the basic functions for building flowchart based graph visualizations.
    OpenMetadataMermaidGraphBuilder
    Construct mermaid markdown graph from Governance Action Framework open metadata store structures.
    ProjectGraphMermaidGraphBuilder
    ProjectGraphMermaidGraphBuilder builds the mermaid graph for a project graph.
    ProjectMermaidGraphBuilder
    ProjectMermaidGraphBuilder builds the mermaid graph for a project element.
    SolutionBlueprintMermaidGraphBuilder
    Creates a mermaid graph rendering of the Open Metadata Framework's solution blueprint graph.
    SolutionComponentMermaidGraphBuilder
    Creates a mermaid graph rendering of the Open Metadata Framework's solution component graph.
    SolutionComponentVisualStyle
    SolutionComponentVisualStyle maps solution component types to appropriate visual styles.
    SolutionRoleMermaidGraphBuilder
    Creates a mermaid graph rendering of the Open Metadata Framework's solution role graph.
    SpecificationMermaidGraphBuilder
     
    VisualStyle
    Capture combinations of colours and shapes to use in mermaid diagrams.
